title: Equilibrium
quote: Test your understanding of equilibrium concepts!

questions.question: What does Le Chatelier's Principle describe?
questions.answer: The effect of changes on equilibrium.
options: The effect of changes on equilibrium.

questions.question: What is the equilibrium constant (K) for the reaction: A + B ⇌ C?
What is the term for a substance that speeds up equilibrium without being consumed?
What is the pH of a neutral solution at 25°C?
